column4: what kind of graphics card do i need if i want to have dual monitor support?
or do i need two graphics cards
i have one geforce ti 4200 that has an analog and a digitial output
i've read you can have a dual-ported gfx card or two gfx cards .. eithr
yes I would not see why not
there are plenty w/ digital video here ; ) just not me =)
do u know if its hard to setup?
there is some hand coding in xorg to get dual monitors
so i have one dual port graphics card, but one port is analgo the other digital.... what do you suggest i do?
I would hook one up to analog & the other to the digital
ok here's a link see what you think:
